column4: i need some help, i compiled my own kernel (because of issues with current one), and on reboot networking doesnt work
i could REALLY use some help, been struggling for hours
well, it DOES detect, and i have an ip, and i can ping, but irc (irssi) and web (lynx, firefox) doesnt work
it's not that we don't WANT to help , but not everyone CAN
